en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors 7th Batang Nash Hash Run Betong, Thailand!
en.content:
REPORT BY FUSIONEXCEL LEADER ANDREW LEONG. 

On the 01st and 02nd May 2009, 600 Hashers gather at Betong, Thailand to participate in the 7th Man National Hash Run. This event was specially organized for Man Hashers. Hashers from all walks of life and places gather to enjoy the run, beer and joy of fellowship. 

FusionExcel was proud to be the main sponsor for this event. For two days, Hashers were shown the power of FusionExcel products, which many Hashers found they needed very much as many suffer from joint injuries after years of Hashing. Some who purchased Quantum Pendant the first day returned to me with amazement and disbelieve on how their performance can improve so dramatically! 

One of the veterans Hashers is Mr. Terry the “Terrible” who is well known for his ability to run fast at the age of 59. He praised how FE's Quantum Pendant helped him recover from injuries that had taken his hashing activities away 2 years ago. After wearing the Quantum Pendant for a few months, his performance started to improve and it is now back to the days before his injury. The “Terrible” has returned! 

FusionExcel's spokesman, Foo Kok Keong did a very good job demonstrating the powers of the Quantum Pendant to the crowd. Bravo to Mr. Foo Kok Keong! 

At the end, everyone was amazed with the Quantum Pendant and happy with the enjoyment and experience of this 2 days national event. AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
